means: [医]Anton Mesmer,奥地利人(1734～1815)于1775年左右他首先于维也纳示教催眠术

sentence.Network_en: The choice is yours: Warrior, Ranger , Monk , Elementalist, Mesmer, or Necromancer.
sentence.Network_cn: 您的选择有: 战士 、 射手 、 僧侣 、 元素使、催眠师和死灵法师.

list.abs: with their spellbinding and mesmerizing powers , they could control anything and everything in the natural world .他们使用迷惑和催眠的能力，就能控制自然界一切事物。
our army before you will mesmerize you ., 我们的军队将会催眠你的一切.
... I stand amazed 我惊奇 So mesmerized 如此入迷 Words can't describe what I'm trying to say 语言无法描述我想说什么.
听音乐学... ... You got me hypnotized,so mesmerized 你让我神魂颠倒，让我深深迷住 And I just got to know 然而我才刚刚意识到.

the GalaxyDress provides a spectacular and mesmerizing effect being embroidered with 24000 full color LEDs , it is the largest wearable display in the world .星空连衣裙展示了一种壮丽而迷人的效果，这24000全彩色LED是服装世界里最大的耐磨显示器，以刺绣的方式表现。

means.word_mean: 1. Austrian physician who tried to treat diseases with a form of hypnotism (1734-1815)
